nodes.text: The Chiss Secret Police was a covert police force within the Chiss Ascendancy during the era of the Galactic War.

The Chiss Secret Police are mentioned in conversation with Aristocra Saganu in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic if the player is a Chiss Imperial Agent. The Chiss Imperial Agent can also mention that they were a former member of the Chiss Secret Police in conversation with Amin-Le, while hunting The Shining Man on Voss.
